alert.note: Alert for Butler; Sedgwick (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 05 at 1:32PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Sedgwick and west central Butler Counties through 200 PM CDT... At 131 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Mcconnell Air Force Base, or near Rose Hill. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Wichita, Derby, Andover, Haysville, Mulvane, Rose Hill, Eastborough, East Wichita, Mcconnell Air Force Base, South Wichita and Oaklawn. This includes the following highways... Interstate 135 between Mile Markers 0 and 4. Interstate 35 between Mile Markers 34 and 57. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
